name: WeAreFeel
slogan: We are reinventing the multivitamin for the modern world
description:
We offer an alternative to any other multivitamin product currently on the market. We bring transparency, quality and sustainability to the health and nutrition industry.

Combining years of experience in finance and the tech startup industry, our core team takes a consumer-centric and holistic approach by offering a new dynamic multivitamin. By supplying the body with the vitamins and minerals it needs without the unnecessary additives we at WeAreFeel believe we can reinvent the world of multivitamins.

jobs.title: Paid Media Manager
jobs.description:
Description:

As our lead for Paid Social & PPC you’ll help us to shape paid acquisition channels for a consumer product within a fast paced, ambitious startup environment where improving health is key. 


What you’ll be doing: 

This role is ideal if you want to focus on delivering the absolute best performance across all paid social & PPC channels. 
You’ll take full ownership of the paid social & PPC strategy both short-term and long term, where you’ll have the opportunity to make a big impact on the future of the business. 
You’ll manage, review, and perform daily account responsibilities associated with Facebook, Instagram, Google AdWords, Yahoo, Bing and other search and social platforms.
Launch and optimize various PPC & paid social campaigns.
Monitor budget and adjust bids to improve ROI.
Track KPIs to assess performance and pinpoint issues.
Produce reports for management (e.g. dashboards).

skills: SEO - SEM - PPC and Content Strategy
